room_title: Escape room "Photoshop Panic" by Unravel Escape Rooms in New York
review: Photoshop Panic was an amazing experience.The owner was very helpful and actively involved in the game. It's an amazing experience and we enjoyed a lot. The game is very challenging and interesting. I would recommend this place for sure.

room_title: Escape room "Photoshop Panic" by Unravel Escape Rooms in New York
review: Amazing time with coworkers! We did the Photoshop Panic room and all I can say is DO IT!  Room is very well thought out and challenging. The team at Unravel we're extremely helpful in providing tips if stuck. Definitely coming back for the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Photoshop Panic" by Unravel Escape Rooms in New York
review: Woo! We escaped! With 11 minutes to spare. Highly recommend this escape room. We did the photoshop panic with 4 people. It is difficult at times but they give you a walkie to ask for as many clues as you want.

room_title: Escape room "Photoshop Panic" by Unravel Escape Rooms in New York
review: My family just took me to this escape room today for my birthday and we had a blast! We managed to escape the photoshop room! The game was very challenging and logic based, so I really liked that about it.

room_title: Escape room "Photoshop Panic" by Unravel Escape Rooms in New York
review: My mom and I had a wonderful time escaping from the Photoshop Panic room. Wished we could have brought more people we knew, but the two couples who joined us were nice. The room was creepier than I thought by the description online, but that made it that much better. The gentleman who checked us in and game mastered our room was cool. Would definitely go back to play the other room.
